entries.author: andy_lester
entries.text: Andy sings the praises of List::UtilsBy. This is similar to List::Util, but provides functions that take a block which controls how the function works.

entries.title: Restrict the import by listing the functions to be imported
entries.author: gabor_szabo
entries.text: Gabor shows how to import just the functions you're going to use, when use'ing a module.

entries.author: sinan_unur
entries.text: Sinan looks at some of the problems you might encounter trying to use Unicode with Perl on Windows.
entries.title: Fixing Perl's Unicode problems on the command line on Windows: A trilogy in N parts
Else Clauses on Loops
entries.text: Jeremy wondered whether anyone else would like an else clause on loops, which would be run if the body of the loop was never run. I've never wanted such a thing, but I did enjoy the comments, which illustrate that one person's "you don't need to ever use X", is another person's "I use that all the time".

entries.author: moritz_lenz
entries.text: Building a visualisation showing what's taking up diskspace, in Perl 6. This is from Moritz's book, Perl 6 by Example, a work in progress.
entries.title: A File and Directory Usage Graph

entries.author: mark_dominus
entries.text: Mark talks us through the problems he had with one line of code.
entries.title: How I got three errors into one line of code

entries.text: Mojolicious now includes Mojo::File, a class for manipulating files. I haven't done a feature-by-feature comparison, but it's similar to Path::Tiny, if you're familiar with that.
entries.author: marcus_ramberg
entries.title: Manipulating the file system with Mojo::File
